City Council members in Clute serve two year terms and are elected from one of five wards. The Council members from Ward A, Ward C, and Ward E are elected in even-numbered years, and Council members from Ward B and Ward D are elected in odd-numbered years. The City Council regularly meets on the second and fourth Thursday of each month at 7:00 PM at the Clute City Hall in the Council Chambers meeting room located at 108 East Main Street.

Click on Agendas or Minutes for information for City Council meetings and to verify that meetings havent been cancelled or moved. Agendas for called meetings and workshops are also shown on this link.

Jeff Crisp Council Ward A (979) 265-1858 (979) 418-3289 jcrisp@clutetexas.gov

Erick Aguilar Council Ward B (979) 418- 3290 eaguilar@clutetexas.gov

Nicole Maddox Council Ward C (979) 480-6560 nmaddox@clutetexas.gov

Joe Lopez Council Ward D (979) 418-3304 jlopez@clutetexas.gov

Frances Vaughn Council Ward E (979) 236-7407 (979) 418-3287 fvaughn@clutetexas.gov
